categoryDefaultQuery.description: Default query to choose template categories, e.g from a skos list of terms.

categorySuggestionQuery.description: Autosuggestion query to choose template categories, e.g from a skos list of terms.

defaultQuery.description: Initial value for query body when creating a new template.

iri.description: IRI of an existing template to edit.

namespace.description: Namespace prefix for generated IRIs of templates, queries and arguments.
